trans-unit.source: Abstract class that provides animation support.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt klasse som gir støtte for animasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Applies an <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bruker en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the property is already animated, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> handoff behavior is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen er allerede animerte, den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> handoff virkemåte brukes.

trans-unit.source: Note that using this method to removing clocks from a property does not stop those clocks.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at du bruker denne metoden til å fjerne stempler fra en egenskap stoppe ikke disse klokker.

trans-unit.source: The property to animate.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for å animere.

trans-unit.source: The clock with which to animate the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Klokken som å animere den angitte egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If `clock` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, all animations will be removed from the specified property (but not stopped).
trans-unit.target: Hvis `clock` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, alle animasjoner vil bli fjernet fra den angitte egenskapen (men ikke stoppet).

trans-unit.source: Applies an <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bruker en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the property is already animated, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen er allerede animerte, den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> brukes.

trans-unit.source: Note that using this method to remove clocks from a property does not stop those clocks.
trans-unit.target: Vær oppmerksom på at du bruker denne metoden til å fjerne stempler fra en egenskap stoppe ikke disse klokker.

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den skrive HandoffBehavior når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>til en egenskap som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objektene tidligere knyttet til egenskapen fortsette å bruke systemressurser; tidsberegning systemet kan ikke fjerne disse klokkene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Unngå ytelsesproblemer når du bruker et stort antall klokker ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bør du fjerne oppbygging klokker fra egenskapen animerte når overføringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere måter å fjerne en klokken.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil fjerne alle klokker fra en egenskap, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden for animerte-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen blir animerte som første parameter, og `null` som sekundet.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Dette fjerner alle animasjonen klokker fra egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -For å fjerne en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>fra en liste over klokker, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen for til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>å hente en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ofte det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsesbehandlingen for en klokken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare roten klokker styres av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>for en underordnet klokken tilbakestiller `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen ikke blir kalt Hvis gjeldende varigheten for klokken er kontinuerlig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user will need to determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må brukeren bestemme når å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dette er primært et problem for animasjoner for objekter som har en lang levetid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt er ugyldige samlet, klokkene kobles også og ugyldige samlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om klokken objekter, se den [tidsberegning System oversikt over og animasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The property to animate.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for å animere.

trans-unit.source: The clock with which to animate the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Klokken som å animere den angitte egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If `handoffBehavior` is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> and `clock` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, all animations will be removed from the specified property (but not stopped).
trans-unit.target: Hvis `handoffBehavior` er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> og `clock` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, alle animasjoner vil bli fjernet fra den angitte egenskapen (men ikke stoppet).

trans-unit.source: If `handoffBehavior` is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> and clock is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, this method has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `handoffBehavior` er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> og klokken <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, denne metoden har ingen virkning.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how the new animation should interact with any current animations already affecting the property value.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir hvordan nye animasjonen skal kommunisere med noen gjeldende animasjoner berøres allerede egenskapsverdien.

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bruker en animasjon til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The animation is started when the next frame is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Animasjonen er startet når neste ramme gjengis.

trans-unit.source: If the specified property is already animated, the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> handoff behavior is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte egenskapen er allerede animerte, den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> handoff virkemåte brukes.

trans-unit.source: If the animation has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> that is greater than zero, the animation begins after that amount of time has elapsed from the time the next frame is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis animasjonen har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>som er større enn null, animasjonen starter etter at tiden har gått etter neste ramme gjengis.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The property to animate.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for å animere.

trans-unit.source: The animation used to animate the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Animasjonen brukes til å animere den angitte egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, any current animations will be removed and the current value of the property will be held.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du animasjonen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, fjernes alle gjeldende animasjoner, og gjeldende verdi for egenskapen vil bli holdt tilbake.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*>

trans-unit.source: If `animation` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, all animations will be removed from the property and the property value will revert back to its base value.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `animation` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, fjernes alle animasjoner fra egenskapen og egenskapsverdien vil gå tilbake til den grunnleggende verdien.

trans-unit.source: Applies an animation to the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Bruker en animasjon til den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The animation is started when the next frame is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Animasjonen er startet når neste ramme gjengis.

trans-unit.source: If the specified property is already animated, the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte egenskapen er allerede animerte, den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> brukes.

trans-unit.source: If the animation has a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A> that is greater than zero, the animation begins after that amount of time has elapsed from the time the next frame is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Hvis animasjonen har en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>som er større enn null, animasjonen starter etter at tiden har gått etter neste ramme gjengis.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system will not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ved hjelp av den skrive HandoffBehavior når du bruker en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>til en egenskap som bruker den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, noen <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>objektene tidligere knyttet til egenskapen fortsette å bruke systemressurser; tidsberegning systemet kan ikke fjerne disse klokkene automatisk.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Unngå ytelsesproblemer når du bruker et stort antall klokker ved hjelp av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>, bør du fjerne oppbygging klokker fra egenskapen animerte når overføringen er fullført.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior>

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere måter å fjerne en klokken.

trans-unit.source: - To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil fjerne alle klokker fra en egenskap, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>eller <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29>metoden for animerte-objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29>

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen blir animerte som første parameter, og `null` som sekundet.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Dette fjerner alle animasjonen klokker fra egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: -For å fjerne en bestemt <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>fra en liste over klokker, bruker du <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>egenskapen for til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>å hente en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>metoden for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjøres ofte det <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsesbehandlingen for en klokken.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock will return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Legg merke til at bare roten klokker styres av en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A>for en underordnet klokken tilbakestiller `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event will not be called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Legg også merke som den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>hendelsen ikke blir kalt Hvis gjeldende varigheten for klokken er kontinuerlig.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed>

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user will need to determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet må brukeren bestemme når å kalle <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Dette er primært et problem for animasjoner for objekter som har en lang levetid.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks will also be disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Når et objekt er ugyldige samlet, klokkene kobles også og ugyldige samlet.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om klokken objekter, se den [tidsberegning System oversikt over og animasjonen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The property to animate.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen for å animere.

trans-unit.source: The animation used to animate the specified property.
trans-unit.target: Animasjonen brukes til å animere den angitte egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: If `handoffBehavior` is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> and the animation's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, any current animations will be removed and the current value of the property will be held. If `handoffBehavior` is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref> and `animation` is a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> reference, all animations will be removed from the property and the property value will revert back to its base value. If `handoffBehavior` is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"></xref>, this method will have no effect if the animation or its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `handoffBehavior` er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> og at animasjonen <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>noen gjeldende animasjoner fjernes og beholdes gjeldende verdi for egenskapen. Hvis `handoffBehavior` er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref> og `animation` er en <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> -referanse, fjernes alle animasjoner fra egenskapen og egenskapsverdien vil gå tilbake til den grunnleggende verdien. Hvis `handoffBehavior` er <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior"> </xref>, denne metoden har ingen virkning hvis animasjonen eller tilhørende <> </> *> er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies how the new animation should interact with any current animations already affecting the property value.
trans-unit.target: En verdi som angir hvordan nye animasjonen skal kommunisere med noen gjeldende animasjoner berøres allerede egenskapsverdien.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer egenskaper for dette objektet avhengighet, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Metoden klone kan brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method to provide a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvet når som helst, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>metode for å angi en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of this instance.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte klone er effektivt en dyp kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The clone's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is **false**.
trans-unit.target: Klone <> </> *> egenskapen * *false**.

trans-unit.source: Makes this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable"></xref> object unmodifiable or determines whether it can be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: Gjør dette <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable"> </xref> objekt unmodifiable eller bestemmer om den kan bli gjort unmodifiable.

trans-unit.source: This method will return **false** when <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.HasAnimatedProperties%2A> is **true**.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilbakestiller **false** når <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.HasAnimatedProperties%2A>er **true**.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.HasAnimatedProperties%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not call this method directly (except when calling base in an implementation).
trans-unit.target: Ikke kall denne metoden direkte (bortsett fra under kall av base i implementering).

trans-unit.source: This method is called internally by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CanFreeze%2A> (with `isChecking` equal to `true`) and <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Freeze%2A> (with `isChecking` equal to `false`).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden internt av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CanFreeze%2A>(med `isChecking` lik `true`) og <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Freeze%2A>(med `isChecking` lik `false`).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Freeze%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CanFreeze%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this method should simply determine whether this instance can be frozen.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne metoden bør ganske enkelt å finne ut om denne forekomsten kan være låst.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if this instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>Hvis denne forekomsten skal faktisk fryse seg selv når denne metoden kalles.

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is , this method returns if this can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable.
trans-unit.target: Hvis isChecking er , metoden returnerer Hvis kan gjøres unmodifiable, eller Hvis ikke gjøres unmodifiable.

trans-unit.source: If isChecking is , this method returns if the if this is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis isChecking er , metoden returnerer hvis Hvis dette er nå unmodifiable, eller Hvis ikke gjøres unmodifiable med side effekten av har begynt å endre låste statusen for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Returns the non-animated value of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den ikke-animerte verdien for den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the specified property is not animated, this method returns the same result as <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den angitte egenskapen ikke er animerte, returnerer denne metoden du samme resultat som <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject.GetValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the property whose base (non-animated) value should be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer egenskapen der grunnleggende (ikke-animerte)-verdi som skal hentes.

trans-unit.source: The value that would be returned if the specified property were not animated.
trans-unit.target: Verdien som returneres hvis den angitte egenskapen ikke ble animerte.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether one or more <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"></xref> objects is associated with any of this object's dependency properties.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om én eller flere <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til noen av egenskaper for dette objektet avhengighet.

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether this object contains animated sub-objects.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir ikke om dette objektet inneholder animerte underordnede objekter.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a dependency object should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Angir om en avhengighet objektet skal serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class uses the ShouldSerializeStoredWeakReference method to determine if a property should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>klassen bruker ShouldSerializeStoredWeakReference-metoden til å finne ut om en egenskapen skal serialiseres.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Represents an object that participates in the dependency property system.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et objekt som deltar i avhengighet egenskapen systemet.

trans-unit.source: to serialize target; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: to serialize target; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
